sentences.en: A: Just pencil in the changes and we'll reprint it.
sentences.cn: 修改的 地方 请用铅笔,我们会重新打印.

sentences.en: Above the content does not have arbitrarily to reprint without myselfpermission, thanks!
sentences.cn: (以上内容未经本人许可不得擅自转载, 谢谢! )

sentences.en: Also has is everybody if likes the speech, may reprint at will!
sentences.cn: 还有就是大家要是喜欢的话, 可以随意转载的啦!

sentences.en: Any chance you could reprint your advice for teenage boys?
sentences.cn: 你能不能重新发一下你给少男们的建议书?

sentences.en: COMAP will not make any changes or reprint certificates for any reason.
sentences.cn: 请注意:COMAP不接受任何原因导致的证书的更改与重新认证.

sentences.en: Demand picked up and a reprint was required last November.
sentences.cn: 由于需求量上升，去年11月，再版已是势在必行。

sentences.en: Grateful acknowledgment is made for permission to reprint.
sentences.cn: 为获准重印致以深切感谢。

sentences.en: In a sense, Unilateralism is another reprint of the hegemonism.
sentences.cn: 一定意义上讲, 单边主义是霸权主义的另一翻版.

sentences.en: It remained an exceptionally rare book until it was reprinted in 1918.
sentences.cn: 在1918年再版之前，这本书一直非常罕见。

sentences.en: Take any way you can do. Like reprint the above.
sentences.cn: 做任何您能做的. 如转载上述.

sentences.en: The book has been selling like hot cakes. The publishers are going to reprint it.
sentences.cn: 这本书一直畅销, 出版社将再版.

sentences.en: The editor agreed to reprint your article in the next issue.
sentences.cn: 编辑同意将你的文章重刊在下一期上.

sentences.en: The publishers are going to reprint it.
Web site to remove some anti - reprint articles garbled interference.
sentences.cn: 去掉部分网站文章 防 转载的干扰乱码.

sentences.en: Would you please give me a reprint?
sentences.cn: 您能不能给我一份抽印本?

sentences.en: You should apply to the publisher for permission to reprint an extract.
sentences.cn: 你要刊登摘要,应请求出版商的准许.

trans.tran_cn: 重印版，再改版，单行本，复印的邮票
trans.tran_en: an occasion when more copies of a book are printed because all the copies of it have been sold
to print a book, story, newspaper article etc again
